Uses of Package
org.daisy.pipeline.script

  • Packages that use org.daisy.pipeline.script 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.pipeline.job
    Jobs are executable units which offer a richer context than executing a XProcPipeline by itself.
    org.daisy.pipeline.script
    Enhanced XprocPipelines with extra metadata to detail the input/output media-type, option directions, script authors and other details.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.script used by org.daisy.pipeline.job 
    Class and Description
    BoundXProcScript 
    XProcScript
    XProcScript is an enhanced XProcPipeline with some extra information, such as production, port and options metadata.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.script used by org.daisy.pipeline.script 
    Class and Description
    BoundXProcScript 
    XProcOptionMetadata
    Option related metadata.
    XProcOptionMetadata.Builder
    Builds the XProcOptionMetadata object.
    XProcOptionMetadata.Output 
    XProcPortMetadata
    Metadata associated to a port.
    XProcPortMetadata.Builder
    Builds the XProcPortMetadata object
    XProcScript
    XProcScript is an enhanced XProcPipeline with some extra information, such as production, port and options metadata.
    XProcScript.Builder
    Builder for XProcScript objects.
    XProcScriptParser
    The Interface XProcScriptParser.
    XProcScriptService
    The Class XProcScriptService defines the script basic attributes loaded from the OSGI bundle.
